title: Makkah Spiritual Oasis near Kaaba with Restaurant & Tea Lounge
description:
Soak up the serene spirituality of Makkah from this sophisticated sanctuary in the iconic Abraj Al Bait complex, offering direct access to Masjid al-Haram and sweeping Kaaba views. Elegant rooms and suites are designed for quiet reflection and comfort, blending contemporary Swiss design with warm Arabian touches.

Savour international and traditional flavours at Al Khairat Restaurant and unwind with a soothing tea or coffee at Masharif Tea Lounge. With the Abraj Al Bait Mall just steps away, shopping and entertainment are always within reach. Whether you're visiting for spiritual renewal or simply a peaceful retreat, this haven offers a deeply meaningful stay in the heart of Islam's holiest city.
offer_address: St Tower F, Ibrahim Al Khalil, St, Tower F, Al Maqam 21955, Saudi Arabia

title: Stylish Makkah Retreat near Al Kaaba with Five Dining Venues
description:
Just steps from the Holy Kaaba, this Mövenpick retreat offers a five-star experience in the heart of Makkah, directly overlooking the King Abdul Aziz Gate. Blending contemporary comfort with spiritual reflection, this elegant hotel is the perfect choice for both pilgrims and visitors.

Savour a rich variety of culinary experiences across five distinctive restaurants and lounges, offering everything from Middle Eastern flavours to international buffet spreads. Whether you're unwinding in a thoughtfully appointed room or exploring sacred sites like Masjid al-Haram and bustling souks, every moment here is designed for ultimate comfort.
location_description: Mövenpick Hotel & Residence Hajar Tower Makkah
offer_address: Diamond Tower, Al Haram, Makkah 21955, Saudi Arabia

title: Swissotel Makkah - Accor - LPP
offer_address: King Abdul Aziz Rd، Endowment، Ajyad Street, Makkah, Makkah, Saudi Arabia, 0

title: Saudi Arabia Mecca Retreat near Great Mosque with Onsite Dining & Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in the cultural richness of Saudi Arabia at this modern sanctuary in the holy city, located moments away from Al Masjid Al Haram mosque. Visit the nearby Al-Salam Park for a leisurely stroll or head to the bustling local markets for an authentic Saudi shopping experience.

Recharge your spirit and body at the onsite spa and refuel at one of three onsite restaurants, savouring delicious international and traditional Saudi dishes in a warm, inviting atmosphere. Need to maintain your wellness routine? The state-of-the-art fitness centre has all the equipment you need for an energising workout.
offer_address: Al Andalus Dist P O Box 4575 Makkah Al Mukarama 24237, Makkah 24237, Saudi Arabia

title: Opulent Mecca Stay Overlooking the Kaaba with Six Restaurants & Two Bars
description:
Towering over Islam's holiest city, this hotel beckons pilgrims with its unmistakable silhouette and unrivalled proximity to the Kaaba. Just steps from your spiritual journey's centre, this 76-floor sanctuary stands as both modern marvel and timeless haven, where the world's largest clock face keeps eternal watch over Islam's most sacred ground.

Surrender to the sublime at this spiritual oasis, where Masjid Al Haram views frame every moment. The six onsite restaurants offer a wealth of possibilities, from the finest cuts of steak at The Grill, to Lebanese buffet cuisine at Al Dar Restaurant and casual dining at Atyaf Restaurant.
location_description: Makkah Clock Royal Tower, a Fairmont Hotel
offer_address: King Abdul Aziz Road, Endowment, Clock Towers Complex, Makkah 24231, Saudi Arabia

title: Sophisticated Makkah Stay Near Al Masjid Al Haram
description: Sun-kissed and sophisticated, a stay at voco Makkah, an IHG Hotel promises quiet and convenience in the spiritual heart of Saudi Arabia. Perfect for groups or families, the hotel's location is unbeatable - just a 10-minute drive from the sacred Masjid Al Haram and offering the perfect base to discover Makkah’s countless treasures. Enjoy voco's signature top-notch facilities, including four world-class restaurants, separated musallas and an onsite shopping mall.
offer_address: Ibrahim Al Khalil Street, Al Mesfalah, Makkah, Saudi Arabia

title: Saudi Arabia Five-Star Makkah Escape near Masqid al-Haram
description: Just across from the resplendent white marbles of Masqid al-Haram, InterContinental Dar Al Tawhid Makkah, an IHG Hotel, is a five-star property only a few steps from the Holy Kaaba and King Fahad Gate. This luxury hotel is located near the city's Islamic sites, such as Mina, Muzdalifah, Mount Arafat and Jabal al-Nour. Beyond its convenient central position, the hotel also boasts a private Prayer Hall and three elegant restaurants serving up international cuisine and traditional specialties.
location_description: InterContinental Dar Al Tawhid Makkah, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ibrahim Al Khalil Road, Makkah, 2728, Saudi Arabia

title: Makkah Raffles Luxury near Masjid al-Haram with Onsite Dining & Spa
description:
Embrace the spiritual heart of Saudi Arabia at this five-star Raffles retreat, ideally located in the vibrant centre of Makkah, just steps from the sacred Kaaba within Masjid Al Haram. For a moment of spiritual reflection, the hotel's prime location allows for easy access to the Grand Mosque, while the shopping delights of Abraj Al Bait Mall are just a short stroll away.

After busy days of exploration retreat to the opulence of your spacious suite, adorned with rich textures and elegant furnishings or indulge in a gastronomic journey across the globe at one of the hotel's four restaurants and rejuvenate at the world-class Raffles Spa.
offer_address: Royal Tower, Near Ibrahim Al Khalil Road, Al Hajlah, Makkah, 24231, Saudi Arabia
